message.content: {"given_definition_quality":95,"better_definition":"test or exam","sentence":"他们考试。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style image of a classroom with several students (adults or older children) sitting at desks, concentrated and writing on papers, with one person at the front (teacher) observing. The environment should look calm but slightly surreal, with soft, muted apocalypse-themed backgrounds—think faint cracks in the walls, old papers scattered, a gentle warm light filtering in, and a hint of an outside world in gentle decay through windows. All figures should appear positive and focused.","sentence_translation":"They are taking a test."}
